passages.name: Entry 3B
passages.text:
''Today is Friday'', the 10th of February. Visibility is 20 meters. I mustn't forget my gloves again. Today, at breaktime, I went to take a look at the library. I walked through all the different halls until I saw |dp>[(link-goto: "Thomas and David", "Dramatis Personae")] sitting at one of the chess boards. They told me they were playing rocket chess. I asked what that was and Thomas said that every piece that takes another will kill anything on the surrounding eight fields of the table plus itself. They had just finished a game and David offered me a regular chess match if I liked. |c1>[I played a regular match against him...
]\ |c2>[I told him I'd rather watch them play rocket chess once more...
]\ |c3>[I told them I'd come to read...
] --- (align: "==>")[|tp>[]]\ { (click-replace: ?c1)[I played a regular match against him, but he made short work of my defense and I had to give up before the break was over.\ { (set: $DavidNotes to $DavidNotes + (a: "He's good at chess. I'm not a total beginner myself but he is way stronger. Chess is such a nice game even when you're loosing."))\ (set: $ThomasNotes to $ThomasNotes + (a: "Thomas doesn't seem to be into regular chess very much. He says it's too much effort wasted on a boardgame."))\ (replace: ?dp)[]\ (replace: ?c2)[]\ (replace: ?c3)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 4.1")]]\ (set: $tasteForGames = $tasteForGames + $firstYearConstant)\ (set: $tasteForBooks = $tasteForBooks + $firstYearConstant)\ (set: $confidence = $confidence - $firstYearConstant)\ (set: $friendship = $friendship + $firstYearConstant)\ } ]\ (click-replace: ?c2)[I told him I'd rather watch them play rocket chess once more and they did. It's quite chaotic but on the other hand, you can play several matches within the big break. We had lots of fun. David won.\ { (set: $DavidNotes to $DavidNotes + (a: "He usually spends his breaktime in the library with Thomas, of all people."))\ (set: $ThomasNotes to $ThomasNotes + (a: "He can get excited about a game he's playing but isn't much upset when he looses."))\ (replace: ?dp)[]\ (replace: ?c1)[]\ (replace: ?c3)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 4.1")]]\ (set: $tasteForGames = $tasteForGames + $firstYearConstant)\ (set: $tasteForBooks = $tasteForBooks - $firstYearConstant)\ (set: $friendship = $friendship + $firstYearConstant)\ } ]\ (click-replace: ?c3)[I told them I'd come to read. David told me that wasn't really worth it because the breaks are too short to get anywhere with a book but I said I wanted to check out which one to borrow and went on with that. I could't find anything worth reading, though.\ { (set: $DavidNotes to $DavidNotes + (a: "He usually spends his time in the library during breaktime and study, but I've never seen him read a book."))\ (set: $ThomasNotes to $ThomasNotes + (a: "He's not into reading at all. Maybe he goes to the library at breaktime to escape the classroom."))\ (replace: ?dp)[]\ (replace: ?c1)[]\ (replace: ?c2)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 4.1")]]\ (set: $tasteForBooks = $tasteForBooks + $firstYearConstant)\ (set: $tasteForGames = $tasteForGames - $firstYearConstant)\ (set: $confidence = $confidence + $firstYearConstant)\ (set: $friendship = $friendship - $firstYearConstant)\ } ]\ (unless: $visitedPassages contains (passage:)'s name)[ { (if: $DavidNotes's length < 1)[ (set: $dramatisPersonae to $dramatisPersonae + (a: "|David>[David]"))\ (set: $DavidNotes to $DavidNotes + (a: "David joined our class two month late, I don't know why. He doesn't talk much, but when he does, it's usually pretty smart. Like he'll sit quietly for twenty minutes in class listening to the discussion about the interpretation of some poem before solving the mystery in three words."))\ ]\ } ]\ }

passages.name: Entry 3A
passages.text:
''Today is Friday'', the 10th of February. Visibility is 20 meters. I mustn't forget my gloves again. There was a snowball-fight in the schoolyard today. Being out front on our team I got hit a few times. I had just formed another snowball, when |dp>[(link-goto: "Christine", "Dramatis Personae")], on the other team, turned and ducked down to make one herself. She was a tempting target. |c1>[I threw my snowball at her...
]\ |c2>[I threw my snowball at someone else after all...
] --- (align: "==>")[|tp>[]]\ { (click-replace: ?c1)[I threw my snowball at her and hit her behind. She was all drenched and didn't look at me for the rest of the day.\ { (set: $ChristineNotes to $ChristineNotes + (a: "She was angry at me for hitting her with the snow ball. I wouldn't have done it had I known she can't stand getting hit herself."))\ (replace: ?dp)[Christine]\ (replace: ?c2)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 4.1")]]\ (set: $confidence = $confidence + $firstYearConstant)\ (set: $infatuation = $infatuation + $firstYearConstant)\ } ]\ (click-replace: ?c2)[I threw my snowball at someone else after all. Michael easily dodged my snowball. While watching stupidly, I got one in the face myself, to my own discomfort and everyone else's great amusement. There must have been a stone in that one since it bruised my cheekbone.\ { (set: $ChristineNotes to $ChristineNotes + (a: "I shouldn't target her when we're playing team games. She only takes part in games to not be a spoilsport. I'm sure she doesn't like childish things one bit."))\ (replace: ?dp)[Christine]\ (set: $confidence = $confidence - $firstYearConstant)\ (set: $infatuation = $infatuation + $firstYearConstant)\ (replace: ?c1)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 4.1")]]\ } ]\ }

passages.name: Entry 4.1
passages.text:
''Today is Monday'', the 8th of May. It was raining the whole day. The leaves are bright green now. |dp>[(link-goto: "Michael", "Dramatis Personae")] took me into a headlock today. He crept up to me as I was rummaging in my bag and pulled me out of my seat by the neck. Apparently, he found this immensely funny. He dragged me around, hooting. I didn't laugh at all. Instead I clung to his arm with one hand to prevent him from choking me. |c1>[(text-style: "strike")[I tried to tell the idiot to stop...
]]\ |c2>[(text-style: "strike")[I tried to break free...
]]\ |c3>[(text-style: "strike")[I brought my hip under his center of gravity...]
]\ |c4>[(text-style: "strike")[I slapped his groin with my free hand...]
] --- (align: "==>")[|tp>[]]\ { (if: $confidence < 40)[ (replace: ?c1)[I tried to tell the idiot to stop...
]\ (click-replace: ?c1)[I tried to tell the idiot to stop, but that made him press even more. I resolved myself to begging for mercy, but that didn't help either. Finally, Anna dropped a comment about how stupidly violent all boys are. Shortly after that he lost interest and let me go.\ { (set: $MichaelNotes to $MichaelNotes + (a: "He's been getting more and more of an arsehole lately. Who is he trying to impress with this?"))\ (set: $AnnaNotes to $AnnaNotes + (a: "She seems little interested in what's going on outside of class lately and hasn't been talking to me in ages. On the other hand, she got me out of that situation when Michael ambushed me and no one else said anything."))\ (replace: ?dp)[Michael]\ (replace: ?c2)[]\ (replace: ?c3)[]\ (replace: ?c4)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 4.2")]]\ (set: $friendship = $friendship + $firstYearConstant) } ]\ ]\ (elseif: $confidence >= 40)[ (replace: ?c3)[I brought my hip under his center of gravity...
]\ (click-replace: ?c3)[I brought my hip under his center of gravity, lifted him up, grabbed his arm with both hands and slammed him back-first into the nearest table. He wailed in pain and curled up on the ground. A few days later, his parents came over to have a talk with mine. Surprisingly enough, I didn't get scolded after all.\ { (set: $MichaelNotes to $MichaelNotes + (a: "I shouldn't have hurt him so badly. But he started it. Who is he trying to impress with this?"))\ (set: $AnnaNotes to $AnnaNotes + (a: "Anna hasn't been talking to me for weeks now. I think she started avoiding me after I had that fight with Michael. As far as I know, she's not talking to him either, though."))\ (replace: ?dp)[Michael]\ (replace: ?c1)[]\ (replace: ?c2)[]\ (replace: ?c4)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 4.2")]]\ (set: $confidence = $confidence + $firstYearConstant)\ (set: $friendship = $friendship - $firstYearConstant)\ } ]\ ]\ (if: $confidence < 45)[ (replace: ?c2)[I tried to break free...
]\ (click-replace: ?c2)[I tried to break free, but it was no use. After struggling for a while, I gave up and begged him for mercy. Finally, Christine dropped a comment about how stupidly violent all the boys are. Shortly after he lost interest and let me go.\ { (set: $MichaelNotes to $MichaelNotes + (a: "He's been getting more and more of an arsehole lately. Who is he trying to impress with this?"))\ (set: $ChristineNotes to $ChristineNotes + (a: "She got me out of an embarrissing situation once. I think she'd be able to stop everyone in class with just a wave of her hand if she wanted. She doesn't usually do so, but she did it for me."))\ (replace: ?dp)[Michael]\ (replace: ?c1)[]\ (replace: ?c3)[]\ (replace: ?c4)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 4.2")]]\ (set: $infatuation = $infatuation + $firstYearConstant) } ]\ ]\ (elseif: $confidence >= 45)[ (replace: ?c4)[I slapped his groin with my free hand...
]\ (click-replace: ?c4)[I slapped his groin with my free hand. He immediately let go. "Are you crazy? Those are my balls, man!". I told him to fuck off and surprisingly, he did. But not without a lot of cursing and name-calling.\ { (set: $MichaelNotes to $MichaelNotes + (a: "Why do I have to get into a fight with Michael? We're supposed to be friends. I've known him since kindergarten. Who is he trying to impress with this?"))\ (replace: ?dp)[Michael]\ (replace: ?c1)[]\ (replace: ?c2)[]\ (replace: ?c3)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 4.2")]]\ (set: $confidence = $confidence + $firstYearConstant)\ } ]\ ]\ (unless: $visitedPassages contains (passage:)'s name)[ { (set: $MichaelNotes to $MichaelNotes + (a: "Michael is great company when you meet him alone. I never noticed in primary school how he can be such a total idiot when he's around others."))\ } ]\ }

passages.text:
''Today is Wednesday'', the 20th of December. It's freezing outside. We'll be able to go skating on the lake before Christmas this year if it goes on. I went to the end-of-year-concert the other night. One after the other the many choirs, bigbands and orchestras of the school performed their acts while the snow was quietly falling outside in the darkness. |c1>[I liked the junior choir and orchestra best...
]\ |c2>[I liked the junior band best...
]\ |c3>[I liked the senior orchestra best...
] --- (align: "==>")[|tp>[]]\ { (click-replace: ?c1)[I liked the junior choir and orchestra best. Anna sang in the choir and David played the trombone. They performed a few great christmas pieces. When the "Gloria in excelsis deo" ended, I noticed I had gotten completely lost in the music.\ { (replace: ?c2)[]\ (replace: ?c3)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 7B")]]\ (set: $friendship = $friendship + $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $tasteForMusic = $tasteForMusic + $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $tasteForBooks = $tasteForBooks + $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $DavidNotes to $DavidNotes + (a: "David plays the trombone in the junior orchestra. They often practice together with the choir."))\ (set: $AnnaNotes to $AnnaNotes + (a: "Anna sings solo parts in the junior choir. She's really good! It's even better when they're accompanied by the orchestra."))\ } ]\ (click-replace: ?c2)[I liked the junior band best. They played a few well-known pop and rock songs. Some were more on the catchy side than others but the best came when Christine sang the Velvet Underground's "Femme fatale". She held the whole audience in her palm with her clear voice.\ { (replace: ?c1)[]\ (replace: ?c3)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 7A")]]\ (set: $infatuation = $infatuation + $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $tasteForMusic = $tasteForMusic + $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $tasteForBooks = $tasteForBooks - $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $ChristineNotes to $ChristineNotes + (a: "Christine has a great singing voice. And she looked so good in the stage lighting."))\ } ]\ (click-replace: ?c3)[I liked the senior orchestra best. They played Rachmaninov's "The Isle of the Dead", which, for some reason, reminded me of a painting I had seen in the art gallery, I think it was by Adolph Menzel. Or was it Caspar David Friedrich or Arnold Böcklin, maybe?\ { (replace: ?c1)[]\ (replace: ?c2)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 7B")]]\ (set: $tasteForBooks = $tasteForBooks + $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $tasteForMusic = $tasteForMusic + $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $tasteForGames = $tasteForGames - $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $confidence = $confidence + $secondyearConstant)\ } ]\ (unless: $visitedPassages contains (passage:)'s name)[ { (if: $DavidNotes's length < 1)[ (set: $dramatisPersonae to $dramatisPersonae + (a: "|David>[David]"))\ (set: $DavidNotes to $DavidNotes + (a: "David joined our class two month late, I don't know why. He doesn't talk much, but when he does, it's usually pretty smart. Like he'll sit quietly for twenty minutes in class listening to the discussion about the interpretation of some poem before solving the mystery in three words."))\ ]\ } ]\ }

passages.name: Entry 7B
Entry 8.2
Entry 8.1
passages.text:
''Today is Monday'', the 8th of July. The sky is blue, the sun is shining, the air salty, like it should be. Today is the first day of the school trip. We took the train that travels over the long dam. When you look out of the window, all you see is water, left and right. I wonder what happens when there is a storm out on the sea. I bet they'll cancel the trains at some point. When we got out at the island terminus we had to walk on the platform along the train to the exit. In front of me were four girls strolling along side by side. As she tried to keep up with the others, |dp>[(link-goto: "Caro", "Dramatis Personae")] got too close to the edge of the platform and her trolley case dropped right under the waiting train. The girls stopped, looking helpless. |c1>[(text-style: "strike")[I told Caro she'd better go get a teacher...
]]\ |c2>[(text-style: "strike")[I told the girls to watch my luggage and went to get a station attendant...]
]\ |c3>[(text-style: "strike")[I told Caro to just climb down onto the tracks and get her suitcase...]
]\ |c4>[(text-style: "strike")[I quickly climbed down onto the tracks to get the suitcase...]
] --- (align: "==>")[|tp>[]]\ { (if: $confidence < 40)[ (replace: ?c1)[I told Caro she'd better go get a teacher...
]\ (click-replace: ?c1)[I told Caro she'd better go get a teacher. By the time she came back with Ms. Cloels and the station attendant, the other girls had already left. The man climbed under the train and got the suitcase out. Ms. Cloels scolded Caro and me for being so careless.\ { (replace: ?dp)[Caro]\ (replace: ?c2)[]\ (replace: ?c3)[]\ (replace: ?c4)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 8.2")]]\ (set: $confidence = $confidence + $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $friendship = $friendship + $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $CaroNotes to $CaroNotes + (a: "She thinks we should just have climbed under the train ourselfes to get the suitcase out. After all, that's all the station attendant did."))\ } ]\ ]\ (if: $confidence >= 45)[ (replace: ?c2)[I told the girls to watch my luggage and went to get a station attendant...
]\ (click-replace: ?c2)[I told the girls to watch my luggage and went to get a station attendant. By the time I was back with him, Caro was standing beside the train alone. The man climbed down onto the track and got her suitcase out. We thanked him and ran with our luggage to catch up with the others. The other girls had already tattled on Caro and Ms. Cloels scolded her for making eveyone else wait.\ { (replace: ?dp)[Caro]\ (replace: ?c1)[]\ (replace: ?c3)[]\ (replace: ?c4)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 8.2")]]\ (set: $friendship = $friendship + $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $confidence = $confidence + $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $infatiation = $infatuation - $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $CaroNotes to $CaroNotes + (a: "Caro was really upset when she was scolded by Ms. Cloels for dropping her suitcase under the train. I wonder why? It's not as though Ms. Cloels wouldn't have forgotten the whole thing a couple of days later."))\ } ]\ ]\ (if: $confidence < 45)[ (replace: ?c3)[I told Caro to just climb down onto the tracks and get her suitcase...
]\ (click-replace: ?c3)[I told Caro to just climb down onto the tracks to get the suitcase. That's what I'd have done had it been my stuff. But she she was afraid the train would start moving while she was down on the tracks. Anna came by and said she'd get the station attendant to help. He turned up soon enough, climbed down and got the suitcase out. The other girls called Caro a clumsy coward for the rest of the day.\ { (replace: ?dp)[Caro]\ (replace: ?c1)[]\ (replace: ?c2)[]\ (replace: ?c4)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 8.2")]](set: $confidence = $confidence + $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $infatuation = $infatuation + $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $friendship = $friendship - $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $CaroNotes to $CaroNotes + (a: "Why couldn't she just get her suitcase out. Nothing would have happened to her. Really now, since when did all the girls become such sissies? All but Christine, that is."))\ } ]\ ]\ (if: $confidence >= 50)[ (replace: ?c4)[I quickly climbed down onto the tracks to get the suitcase...
]\ (click-replace: ?c4)[I quickly climbed down onto the tracks to get the suitcase. The girls were all going don't it's not allowed and oh so dangerous but what could happen? This was the terminus and the train would surely get cleaned before it went on its return trip. It took all of two minutes and I didn't even get all that dirty. For all their worrying none of them lent me a hand when I climbed back up.\ { (replace: ?dp)[Caro]\ (replace: ?c1)[]\ (replace: ?c2)[]\ (replace: ?c3)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 8.2")]]\ (set: $confidence = $confidence + $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $friendship = $friendship + $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $infatuation = $infatuation - $secondYearConstant)\ (set: $CaroNotes to $CaroNotes + (a: "I don't know why Caro didn't even thank me when I rescued her suitcase from certain destruction. Maybe it was because of the other girls around."))\ } ]\ ]\ (unless: $visitedPassages contains (passage:)'s name)[ { (set: $CaroNotes to $CaroNotes + (a: "Caro seems to have difficulties keeping up with the other girls. Like how they're all getting into music now and she is still into horses."))\ } ]\ }

passages.name: Entry 9
passages.text:
''Today is Saturday'', the 5th of October. This evening, the sunset painted the clouds in so many different colours. Now it's dark and the wind is blowing raindrops against my window. We played the team from the little town to the southeast today, losing as always. Their stadium is small and they only have two changing rooms. One for them, one for us. It was decided |dp>[(link-goto: "Kathrin", "Dramatis Personae")] should use the shower first this time around. While we were waiting for her to finish, Sebastian started banging on the door to the showers, going "Hurry up, or we'll come in." and "We can seeeee you...", which got him some dirty laughter from the others. |c1>[(text-style: "strike")[Everyone joined into the fun. We must have scared her pretty good...
]]\ |c2>[(text-style: "strike")[This way I wasn't going to get home any time soon, I thought...
]] --- (align: "==>")[|tp>[]]\ { (if: $confidence < 45 or $friendship < 45)[ (replace: ?c1)[Everyone joined into the fun. We must have scared her pretty good...
]\ (click-replace: ?c1)[Everyone joined into the fun. We must have scared her pretty good. She wouldn't leave the shower anymore. In the end, the coach had to persuade her to come out and she didn't even take the time to pack her equipment before she fled.\ { (replace: ?dp)[Kathrin]\ (replace: ?c2)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 10B")]]\ (set: $tasteForBooks = $tasteForBooks - $thirdYearConstant)\ (set: $tasteForMusic = $tasteForMusic + $thirdYearConstant)\ (set: $friendship = $friendship - $thirdYearConstant)\ (set: $KathrinInTeam = false)\ (set: $KathrinNotes to $KathrinNotes + (a: "Kathrin has quit the ice hockey team. That's probably for the best. She's better off out if she can't stand the banter."))\ } ]\ ]\ (else:)[ (replace: ?c2)[This way I wasn't going to get home any time soon...
]\ (click-replace: ?c2)[This way I wasn't going to get home any time soon, I thought. But I couldn't have been more mistaken. Kathrin was out of the shower in no time, packed her stuff and left without another word.\ { (replace: ?dp)[Kathrin]\ (replace: ?c1)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 10A")]]\ (set: $tasteForBooks = $tasteForBooks + $thirdYearConstant)\ (set: $tasteForGames = $tasteForGames + $thirdYearConstant)\ (set: $KathrinNotes to $KathrinNotes + (a: "Kathrin is not trying to hide that she hates Sebastian. Luckly she's my winger and not his. I don't think those two would ever be able to give up a puck to the other."))\ } ]\ ]\ (unless: $visitedPassages contains (passage:)'s name)[ { (if: $SebastianNotes's length < 1)[ (set: $dramatisPersonae to $dramatisPersonae + (a: "|Sebastian>[Sebastian]"))\ (set: $SebastianNotes to $SebastianNotes + (a: "Sebastian is the captain of our team. He and his brother (who's the captain of the senior team) have both been playing ice hockey since they were small. No wonder he's really fast and strong."))\ ]\ (set: $dramatisPersonae to $dramatisPersonae + (a: "|Kathrin>[Kathrin]"))\ (set: $KathrinNotes to $KathrinNotes + (a: "She's the last girl on our team. All the others have dropped out a year or two ago. Some of them weren't half bad at it and they seemed to have fun. I don't understand why they'd quit. Anyway, Kathrin is the right winger on my line."))\ } ]\ }

passages.name: Quote 1
passages.text:
(font: "Times New Roman")[(align: "<==")[##''Fifth grade, ten years old'']]
---
{
	(if: $quoteline > 0)[//This is a musician's face, I told myself. This is the child Mozart. This is a life full of beautiful promise. Little princes in legends are not different from this. Protected, sheltered, cultivated, what could not this child become? When by mutation a new rose is born in a garden, all gardeners rejoice. They isolate the rose, tend it, foster it. But there is no gardener for men. This little Mozart will be shaped like the rest by the common stamping machine.//
	(align: "==>")[- Antoine de Saint-Exupery]
---
	(align: "=><=")[[[Stamp a little Mozart->Entry 1]]]
	]
	(elseif: $quoteline < 0)[//Circumstances define us; they force us onto one road or another, and then they punish us for it.//
	(align: "==>")[- Ivan Turgenev]
---
	(align: "=><=")[[[Get forced onto one road or another->Entry 1]]]
	]
(else:)[//Young men of the same age are grouped together as a class and then, on the fulfillment of certain rites involving severe and often cruel ordeals, are promoted to the next class. It may happen that some of them perish during these ordeals, but that is the exception.//
(align: "==>")[- Elias Canetti, //Crowds and Power//]
---
(align: "=><=")[[[Advance a class->Entry 1]]]
	]
(save-game:"Slot A")
}

passages.name: Entry 10A
Quote 3
passages.text:
(set: $age = 12)\
(font: "Times New Roman")[(align: "<==")[##''Seventh grade, twelve years old'']]
		---
(if: $quoteline > 0)[{//There are limits to what a mule or an ass will stand; but Man will suffer himself to be degraded until his vileness becomes so loathsome to his oppressors that they themselves are forced to reform it.// 
(align: "==>")[― George Bernard Shaw]
---
(align: "=><=")[[[Test the limits of the human animal->Entry 9]]]}]\
(elseif: $quoteline < 0)[{
//The crowd which the seeker after fame envisages consists of shadows, that is, of creatures who do not even have to be alive so long as they are capable of one thing, which is to repeat his name. He wants them to repeat it often, and to repeat it in front of others, so that as many as possible may hear it and learn how to say it themselves.//
(align: "==>")[- Elias Canetti, //Crowds and Power//]
---
(align: "=><=")[[[Repeat the name->Entry 9]]]}]\

//It was not that one did not want to possess the right qualities or feel the correct emotions, but that one could not. The good and the possible never seemed to coincide.//

passages.text:
''Today is Friday'', the 1st of September. Today was probably the last nice day of summer. The forecast says it'll get cooler from tomorrow onwards. { (if: $AnnaStory is true)[ (if: $goodEnding is true)[ I went swimming today with Thomas. We took a ball with us and spent the whole afternoon in the water. On the way back home, he told me he won't be going to our school anymore from next term onwards. His grades aren't improving and so the principal thinks he'll be better of going to the comprehensive.

(if: $boardingSchool is true)[ I told him I wasn't coming back either. He said we should make sure to meet in the holidays and ask Anna and David to come along. He's right, of course, we should. But somehow I don't see it coming. ]\ (else:)[ I told him we'd still be able to meet and that we should ask Anna and David to come along next time. He just said thank you. I didn't dwell on it. He's not totally stupid. He'll want to make a fresh start at the comp. I wished him luck. ]\ ]\ (elseif: $AnnaInSchool is true)[ They found Caro today. They say she had been floating in the lake for a few days, that it was most likely an accident, that she swam out too far and didn't make it back. I know Caro; she knows her limit, so I guess she reached it. I think I know who ratted out Christine to the teachers now.

(if: $boardingSchool is true)[ I try not to think about it. I feel better when I imagine starting at the boarding school next week. I don't think I could stomach any of my classmates. ]\ (else:)[ I think a bunch of people from our class will be able to put two and two together. None of them will speak up about it, though. I for one won't, that's for sure. ]\ ]\ (else:)[ They found Anna today. They say she had been floating in the lake for a few days, that it was most likely an accident, that she swam out too far and didn't make it back. I know Anna; she knows her limit, so I guess she reached it. Her parents haven't said anything. I doubt she told them.

(if: $boardingSchool is true)[ I try not to think about it. I feel better when I imagine starting at the boarding school next week. I don't think I could stomach any of my classmates. ]\ (else:)[ I don't think any of the others will talk. I for one won't, that's for sure. ]\ ]\ ]\ (else:)[ (if: $goodEnding is true)[ I went swimming today with Thomas. We took a ball with us and spent the whole afternoon in the water. On the way back home, he told me he won't be going to our school anymore from next term onwards. His grades aren't improving and so the principal thinks he'll be better of going to the comprehensive.

(if: $boardingSchool is true)[ I told him I wasn't coming back either. He said we should make sure to meet in the holidays and ask Anna and David to come along. He's right, of course, we should. But somehow I don't see it coming. ]\ (else:)[ I told him we'd still be able to meet and that we should ask Anna and David to come along next time. He just said thank you. I didn't dwell on it. He's not totally stupid. He'll want to make a fresh start at the comp. I wished him luck. ]\ ]\ (else:)[ I went swimming on my own again today. I've been going to the lake every day for the last week, but I haven't met any of the others. Today, I waited until after it got dark.

(if: $boardingSchool is true)[ I guess I'll have to take my chance to make a fresh start next term. At least I'll be out of reach for all the idiots around here. ]\ (else:)[ I think it'll be a long time before I can make friends with people again. ]\ ]\ ]\ } I won't be writing in this diary any more. --- { (set: $endScore = $confidence + $friendship - $infatuation) (if: $endScore <= 20)[ //I had absolutely lost all sense of personal dignity, and could not tear myself away from the spectacle of my own misery.// (align: "==>")[- Ivan Turgenev, //Diary of a superfluous man//] ] (elseif: $endScore <= 40)[ //Failure, failure, failure – failure behind me, failure ahead of me – that was by far the deepest conviction that I carried away.// (align: "==>")[- George Orwell, //Such, such were the joys//] ] (elseif: $endScore <= 60)[ //That was the pattern of school life – a continuous triumph of the strong over the weak. Vitrue consisted in winning: it consisted in being bigger, stronger, handsomer, richer, more popular, more elegant, more unscrouplous than other people – in dominating them, bullying them, making them suffer pain, making them look foolish, getting the better of them in every way. Life was hierachical and whatever happened was right. There were the strong, who deserved to win and always did win, and there were the weak, who deserved to lose and always did lose, everlastingly.// (align: "==>")[- George Orwell, //Such, such were the joys//] ] (elseif: $endScore <= 80)[ //There is a sweetness in beeing the sole source, the autocratic and irresponsible cause of the greatest joy and profoundest pain to another.// (align: "==>")[- Ivan Turgenev] ] (elseif: $endScore <= 100)[ //At the time I could not see beyond the moral dilemma that is presented to the weak in a world governed by the strong: Break the rules, or perish. I did not see that in that case the weak have the right to make a different set of rules for themselves; because, even if such an idea had occured to me, there was no one in my environment who could have confirmed me in it.// (align: "==>")[- George Orwell, //Such, such were the joys//] ] (else:)[ //Thank goodness you're a failure- it's why I so distinguish you! Anything else to-day is too hideous. Look about you - look at the successes. Would you be one, on your honour?// (align: "==>")[- Henry James, //The Ambassadors//] ] } (align: "=><=")[[[That sums it up pretty well.->Start]] [[Actually it went very differently for me, really!->Restart]]]\ { (if: $quoteline > 0)[(set: $quoteline = -1)]\ (elseif: $quoteline < 0)[(set: $quoteline = 0)]\ (else:)[(set: $quoteline = 1)]\ (set: $infatuation = 45 - (floor: (abs: $quoteline) * (random: 0,0)))\ (set: $friendship = 45 - (floor: (abs: $quoteline) * (random: 0,0)))\ (set: $confidence = 45 - (floor: (abs: $quoteline) * (random: 0,0)))\ (set: $tasteForBooks = 35 - (floor: (abs: $quoteline) * (random: 0,0)))\ (set: $tasteForMusic = 25)\ (set: $tasteForGames = 20 + (floor: (abs: $quoteline) * (random: 0,0)))\ (set: $age = 10)\ (set: $KathrinInTeam = true)\ (set: $hatedBySinster = false)\ (set: $ThomasInSchool = true)\ (set: $AnnaInSchool = true)\ (set: $goodEnding = true)\ (set: $i = 0)\ (set: $j = 0)\ (set: $k = 0)\ (set: $visitedPassages to (array:))\ (set: $dramatisPersonae to (array:))\ (set: $AnnaNotes to (array:))\ (set: $CaroNotes to (array:))\ (set: $MichaelNotes to (array:))\ (set: $ThomasNotes to (array:))\ (set: $ChristineNotes to (array:))\ (set: $PhillipNotes to (array:))\ (set: $RichardNotes to (array:))\ (set: $DavidNotes to (array:))\ (set: $SisNotes to (array:))\ (set: $SebastianNotes to (array:))\ (set: $KathrinNotes to (array:))\ (set: $OTNotes to (array:))\ }

passages.text:
''Today is Monday'', the 24th of February. Still no snow. The ice on the lake is perfect, though. We had PE in the big gym today. I had almost finished changing into my sports kit when |dp>[(link-goto: "Phillip and Richard", "Dramatis Personae")] came up to me and Phillip didn't even say a word before he slapped me in the face. There were about half of the other guys still in the changing room. I had one arm half into my sleeve and couldn't fight back even if I wanted. |c1>[I covered my face as well as I could with my free hand...
]\ |c2>[I called out for help...
] --- (align: "==>")[|tp>[]]\ { (click-replace: ?c1)[I covered my face as well as I could with my free hand. So Phillip grabbed it while Richard proceeded to slap me up. I took about 20 without flinching before I started to tear up. This was what they had been waiting for so they left me alone. I went to the bathroom to rinse my face but my eyes were still red and my cheeks swollen when I came five minutes late for the lesson. Mr. Joyless greeted me with three extra laps.\ { (replace: ?dp)[Phillip and Richard]\ (replace: ?c2)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 12.1")]]\ (set: $PhillipNotes to $PhillipNotes + (a: "This guy won't ever have a fair fight with anyone, I know that much."))\ (set: $RichardNotes to $RichardNotes + (a: "I get the impression Richard leaves the talking to Phillip because he's mostly incapable of doing it himself."))\ } ]\ (click-replace: ?c2)[I called out for help, but nobody helped me. I think I saw David quietly slip away out of the corner of my eye. Phillip and Richard took turns slapping me. I held out for 20 or so before tears came to my eyes. This was what they had been waiting for so they left me alone. I went to the bathroom to rinse my face but my eyes were still red and my cheeks swollen when I came five minutes late for the lesson. Mr. Joyless greeted me with three extra laps.\ { (replace: ?dp)[Phillip and Richard]\ (replace: ?c1)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 12.1")]]\ (set: $friendship = $friendship - $thirdYearConstant)\ (set: $PhillipNotes to $PhillipNotes + (a: "This guy won't ever have a fair fight with anyone, I know that much."))\ (set: $RichardNotes to $RichardNotes + (a: "I get the impression Richard leaves the talking to Phillip because he's mostly incapable of doing it himself."))\ (set: $DavidNotes to $DavidNotes + (a: "David didn't help me when Phillip and Richard slapped me up in the changing room. He saw what was happening, he heard me call out for help and yet he just left. That was not cool."))\ } ]\ }

(font: "Times New Roman")[(align: "=><=")[###''Rite of Passage''
Version 1.0 
Written in Twine 2 (Harlowe) for the Interactive Fiction Competition 2016 by Arno v. Borries.

Beta testing by Felicity Banks, Wade Clarke, Keetie, Ade McTravish and verityvirtue.

Cover illustration adapted from a Photo by Petritap.

Players may want to note that this game includes an autosave function. Playing on the full screen setting is encouraged.

The author would like to thank all those who shared their childhood memories with him.]]

passages.name: Entry 12.1
passages.text:
''Today is Wednesday'', the 14th of May. The weather is terrible. April was so nice, why does it have to go back to wet and muddy? |dp>[(link-goto: "Caro", "Dramatis Personae")] didn't come to school today. I guess no one would have noticed but Ms. Cloels took the opportunity to talk to us about her. She said Caro knew she was an outsider in the group very well by herself and didn't need to be reminded of it constantly. If we could just leave her in peace. I've not spoken to Caro in months, but neither have I with any of the other girls. I don't know if she's been chaffed by them. Thinking about it though, she's been the subject of some banter amongst the boys, being the baby she still is. After Ms. Cloels had no luck asking us for our opinion for a while, she called up Christine to say something, because she is the class rep, after all. Christine stood up and told her that she'd be totally willing to leave Caro alone if it wasn't for the fact that it was so obvious she was still getting her clothes bought by her mother. Some of the other girls shouted to her in agreement. |c1>[(text-style: "strike")[Christine sure knows how to get straight to the point...
]]\ |c2>[(text-style: "strike")[I was speechless...]
]\ |c3>[(text-style: "strike")[I raised my hand, unable to let that stand...]
]\ |c4>[]\ |c5>[] --- (align: "==>")[|tp>[]]\ { (if: $infatuation > 55)[ (replace: ?c1)[Christine sure knows how to get straight to the point...
]\ (unless: $visitedPassages contains (passage:)'s name)[ { (set: $ChristineNotes to $ChristineNotes + (a: "I have come to like Christine. I can't take my eyes of her. I'm not sure, is this love?"))\ } ]\ (click-replace: ?c1)[Christine sure knows how to get straight to the point. Ms. Cloels knew nothing to say against that. Caro really needs to sort out her issues if she wants to become someone to be seen with. Anna wanted to say something, too, but Ms. Cloels cut her off and said we should start class.\ { (replace: ?dp)[Caro]\ (replace: ?c2)[]\ (replace: ?c3)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(if: $hatedBySinster is true)[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 12.2")](else:)[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Quote 4")]]]\ (set: $friendship = $friendship - $thirdYearConstant)\ (set: $infatuation = $infatuation + $thirdYearConstant)\ (set: $CaroNotes to $CaroNotes + (a: "Caro really needs to grow up if she wants to be friends with people."))\ } ]\ ]\ (if: $infatuation <= 55)[ (replace: ?c2)[I was speechless...
]\ (click-replace: ?c2)[I was speechless, and so was Ms. Cloels for a moment. I didn't think Christine was right but what could I say? She sat down very smugly. The room seemed even quieter than before. Finally, Anna, very calmly and without raising her hand, said: "Christine, I do not think it is any of your business what Caro wears and where she gets it from." Christine wanted to answer to that but Ms. Cloels found her voice again and cut her off by starting the biology lesson.\ { (replace: ?do)[Caro]\ (replace: ?c1)[]\ (replace: ?c3)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(if: $hatedBySinster is true)[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 12.2")](else:)[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Quote 4")]]]\ (set: $CaroNotes to $CaroNotes + (a: "There is nothing I can do to help Caro, it's a girls thing only the girls can work out."))\ (set: $AnnaNotes to $AnnaNotes + (a: "Anna stood up to Christine and defended Caro. Christine didn't look very happy about it."))\ (set: $ChristineNotes to $ChristineNotes + (a: "Christine was quick to defend the way the girls treat Caro. Who knows, maybe she bullies her as well?"))\ } ]\ ]\ (if: $confidence >= 50 and $friendship >= 50 and $infatuation <= 50)[ (replace: ?c3)[I raised my hand, unable to let that stand...
]\ (click-replace: ?c3)[I raised my hand, unable to let that stand. Ms. Cloels was obviously thankful for it and called me up. { (replace: ?do)[Caro]\ (replace: ?c1)[]\ (replace: ?c2)[]\ (replace: ?c4)[I said I didn't think there was anything wrong with how Caro dressed...
]\ (click-replace: ?c4)[I said I didn't think there was anything wrong with how Caro dressed. "That's just because you can't dress any better," Christine called out immediately and of course the whole class found it hillarious. That ended the discussion.\ { (set: $CaroNotes to $CaroNotes + (a: "The whole class had a good laugh at my expense, but I got them to stop their gossip about Caro for the moment."))\ (set: $ChristineNotes to $ChristineNotes + (a:"Christine was quick to change the subject onto myself when I started to criticise what she said about Caro."))\ (set: $AnnaNotes to $AnnaNotes + (a:"Anna told me she was glad I stood up for Caro because this is difficult and maybe even dangerous for a girl to do right now. I wonder why?"))\ (set: $friendship = $friendship + $thirdYearConstant)\ (set: $confidence = $confidence - $thirdYearConstant)\ (set: $infatuation = $infatuation - $thirdYearConstant)\ (replace: ?c5)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(if: $hatedBySinster is true)[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 12.2")](else:)[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Quote 4")]]]\ } ]\ (replace: ?c5)[I said I didn't think that was any of our business...
]\ (click-replace: ?c5)[I said I didn't think that was any of our business and that it was, in any case, no reason to be mean to Caro. Christine immediately said she herself had never been mean and that she was sure everyone else was just making a joke now and then and that none of that was meant to hurt Caro.\ { (set: $CaroNotes to $CaroNotes + (a: "I got the girls to stop their gossip about Caro for the moment. Don't know if this will help her much, but at least I tried."))\ (set: $ChristineNotes to $ChristineNotes + (a:"I had to shoot down Christine's argument to stop the open gossip about Caro. I hope she doesn't take it badly and realises she was wrong."))\ (set: $AnnaNotes to $AnnaNotes + (a:"Anna told me she was glad I stood up for Caro but isn't sure it'll help. She tells me Christine will remember me for this. I hope she means Christine will remember me fondly. For some reason I'm not so sure about that."))\ (set: $friendship = $friendship + $thirdYearConstant)\ (replace: ?c4)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(if: $hatedBySinster is true)[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 12.2")](else:)[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Quote 4")]]]\ } ]\ } ]\ ]\ (unless: $visitedPassages contains (passage:)'s name)[ { (set: $CaroNotes to $CaroNotes + (a: "She still hasn't started to develop even one bit when most of the other girls are already wearing bras."))\ } ]\ }

passages.text:
''Today is Saturday'', the 25th of October. A storm is raging in the darkness ouside my window. Mama and Papa asked Sis and me if we wanted their tickets for the Opera tonight because for some reason they coudn't go themself. So I ended up watching //The Abduction from the Seraglio// together with my sister. I got the goosebumbs even before the overture started, because I spotted two of my classmates: |dp>[(link-goto: "Anna and David", "Dramatis Personae")] were sitting in a loge straight accross from ours. They seemed not to have noticed me. Then the lights went low, the audience went quiet and the music began. |c1>[(text-style: "strike")[Let's see if they spot me, I thought...]
]\ |c2>[(text-style: "strike")[I decided to hide in the shadow behind the loge curtain...]
]\ |c3>[(text-style: "strike")[I waved to them to get their attention...]
]\ |c4>[]\ |c5>[] --- (align: "==>")[|tp>[]]\ { (if: $friendship >= 55)[ (replace: ?c1)[Let's see if they spot me, I thought...
]\ (click-replace: ?c1)[Let's see if they spot me, I thought. They seemed to give all their attention to the performance so after a while I stopped watching them and turned to what was happening on stage myself. It was not until right after the aria //"These young men who go a-spying"// that I looked over to their loge again. I fliched in my seat when I saw Anna watching me through her binoculars. She waved her hand. { (replace: ?dp)[Anna and David]\ (replace: ?c4)[I waved back at her...
]\ (click-replace: ?c4)[I waved back at her and she signalled to meet them at the snack bar during the break. When we got there Sis told me she'd try to get us a bottle of champagne if we could keep our mouths shut. She managed to get it even though she doesn't really look 16 yet. I guess the bartender must have had a nice day. We emptied it between the four of us. Mozart just gets better when you're tipsy. Anna may have had a little too much. In the end she got bold enough to kiss David on the cheek. He flushed bright red, the lucky bastard.\ { (set: $friendship = $friendship + $fourthYearConstant)\ (replace: ?c5)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 14B")]]\ (set: $AnnaNotes to $AnnaNotes + (a: "I think Anna likes David a lot."))\ (set: $DavidNotes to $DavidNotes + (a: "I have asked him what he thinks about Anna but he won't tell."))\ } ]\ (replace: ?c5)[I pretended not to have noticed her...
]\ (click-replace: ?c5)[I pretended not to have noticed her and retreated behind the loge curtain. I didn't dare look over to them for the rest of the evening.\ { (set: $friendship = $friendship - $fourthYearConstant)\ (set: $confidence = $confidence - $fourthYearConstant)\ (replace: ?c4)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 14A")]]\ } ]\ (replace: ?c2)[]\ (replace: ?c3)[]\ } ]\ ]\ (if: $confidence < 55 and $friendship < 55)[ (replace: ?c2)[I decided to hide in the shadow behind the loge curtain...

passages.text:
''Today is Saturday'', the 11th of April. Darkness, rain and mud. It's a wasteland. The world abloom seems years away. There was a big commotion yesterday because somehow the teachers must have gotten word of the cannabis thing in our |dp>[(link-goto: "class", "Dramatis Personae")]. Sinster told us he was so disappointed and that the perpetrators would of course have to face the consequences of their actions. The next breaktime, Thomas said he was glad we'd get rid of these idiots now. |c1>[(text-style: "strike")[I said yeah, good riddance to them...]
]\ |c2>[(text-style: "strike")[I told him to better keep his mouth shut and wait what was going to happen...]
]\ |c3>[]\ |c4>[] --- (align: "==>")[|tp>[]]\ { (if: true)[ (replace: ?c1)[I said yeah, good riddance to them...
]\ (click-replace: ?c1)[I said yeah, good riddance to them and we went on joking about it for a while. When I wanted to go home after school I came by Phillip, Michael and Richard beating up Thomas just outside the school gate. There were a bunch of other people standing around and watching. Christine saw me and asked whether I wanted to help Thomas, wasn't I his friend after all? { (replace: ?dp)[class]\ (replace: ?c2)[]\ (if: $confidence >= 45 and $friendship >= 50 and $infatuation < 60)[ (replace: ?c3)[ (link-replace: "She was right, of course...
")[She was right, of course. I dropped my bag and pulled Richard off Thomas. Thomas took the opportunity to get one of his arms free. He pulled a switchblade out of his pocket and thrust it into Michael's belly. As he stabbed him again and again, he screamed at him why he had to make him do this, tears streaming down his face. Before we had Thomas pinned to the ground, Michael was already covered in blood. They had to get him to hospital in a helicopter.\ { (replace: ?c4)[]\ (replace: ?tp)[(font: "Times New Roman")[(link-goto: "Continue the diary", "Entry 17")]]\ (set: $tasteForBooks = $tasteForBooks - $fourthYearConstant)\ (set: $tasteForMusic = $tasteForMusic + $fourthYearConstant)\ (set: $confidence = $confidence - 1 * $fourthYearConstant)\ (set: $friendship = $friendship - 2 * $fourthYearConstant)\ (set: $goodEnding = false)\ (set: $AnnaInSchool = true)\ (set: $ThomasInSchool = false)\ } ]\ ]\ ]\ (else:)[(replace: ?c3)[(text-style: "strike")[She was right, of course...
]]]\ (replace: ?c4)[ (link-replace: "I just kept walking past the scene...

passages.name: Entry 16B
passages.text:
''Today is Saturday'', the 11th of April. Darkness, rain and mud. It's a wasteland. The world abloom seems years away. There was a big commotion yesterday because somehow the teachers must have gotten word of the cannabis thing in our |dp>[(link-goto: "class", "Dramatis Personae")]. Sinster told us he was so disappointed and that the perpetrators would of course have to face the consequences of their actions. Christine came up to me during breaktime yesterday and asked whether I could arrange a meeting between Anna and her after school. She said she wanted to make up to Anna and would like to do so in a quiet place. She told me to bring Anna to the abandoned construction site behind the subway station. |c1>[(text-style: "strike")[If she wanted to make up with Anna, this was the least I could do...]

''Today is Thursday'', the 26th of February. Still below zero. When are they going to get that jammed-open window in our classroom fixed? |dp>[(link-goto: "Phillip and his Crew", "Dramatis Personae")] have been smoking weed in between lessons for a while now. I wonder where they're getting it from, but I'm not going to ask Phillip of all people. It's been catching on now. I think David, Robert and Christine and maybe also some of the other girls have tried it. No teacher ever seems to notice the smell. |c1>[I've got to try it myself sometime...
]\ |c2>[Don't they know drugs destroy people...
